title: Ticket #201: permission denied at the collector not sent back to condor_status
description: if you run condor_status and it does not have authorization from the collector (PERMISSION DENIED for ALLOW_READ) that information is not propagated to condor_status and it instead just prints a blank line.
remarks:
2009-Feb-16 11:52:18 by matt:
That blank line is unconditionally printed, likely should be removed altogether
creator: zmiller
